summary: rose: Fix NULL pointer dereference in rose_send_frame()
details:
rose: Fix NULL pointer dereference in rose_send_frame()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.8 by commit a601e5eded33bb88b8a42743db8fef3ad41dd97e, it was introduced in version v6.0 by commit 3c53cd65dece47dd1f9d3a809f32e59d1d87b2b8. For more details please see the references link.
